issue.title: Create wheels for M1 Silicon for older versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13583](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13583). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Snowflake data warehouse has a python client that requires an older version of pyarrow-->=3.0.0,<3.1.0:

<https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/python-connector-pandas.html#requirements>

I've tried everything I can think of or read about to get the older versions of pyarrow working on my M1 but to no avail.  Snowflake is saying they won't update their connector until September:

 

<https://github.com/snowflakedb/snowflake-connector-python/issues/815>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13583?focusedCommentId=17395467) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
We have builds for older pyarrow versions for the M1 on conda-forge. You can either switch to using conda/mamba as a package manager here or look up the patches that we are using to build the older versions for the M1.
